fig.title: Superposition of Nsp15 monomers:SARS-CoV-2 (teal, chain A; blue, chain B), SARS-CoV (pink), MERS-CoV (grey).
fig.label: Figure 2.
fig.sd-panel: Superposition of Nsp15 monomers:SARS-CoV-2 (teal, chain A; blue, chain B), SARS-CoV (pink), MERS-CoV (grey).

fig.title: Sequence alignment of SARS-CoV-2 Nsp15 coronaviral homologs with structures available in the PDB:SARS-CoV-2 (6VWW), SARS-CoV (2H85), MERS-CoV (5YVD), H-CoV-29E (4RS4) MHV (2GTH).
fig.label: Figure 3.
fig.sd-panel: Sequence alignment of SARS-CoV-2 Nsp15 coronaviral homologs with structures available in the PDB:SARS-CoV-2 (6VWW), SARS-CoV (2H85), MERS-CoV (5YVD), H-CoV-29E (4RS4) MHV (2GTH). The secondary structure elements labeled for SARS-CoV-2 Nsp15.

fig.title: Structure of SARS-CoV-2 hexamer in surface representation with each subunit shown in different color.
fig.label: Figure 4.
fig.sd-panel: Structure of SARS-CoV-2 hexamer in surface representation with each subunit shown in different color. The active site residues are colored red.

fig.title: Superposition of the SARS-CoV-2 Nsp15 NendoU active site with its homologs:SARS-CoV-2 (teal, chain A), SARS-CoV (pink), MERS-CoV (grey).
fig.label: Figure 5.
fig.sd-panel: Superposition of the SARS-CoV-2 Nsp15 NendoU active site with its homologs:SARS-CoV-2 (teal, chain A), SARS-CoV (pink), MERS-CoV (grey).
